MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers calling from the PA19 postcode area of Gourock, affecting properties in Kempock Street. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am to safely complete repairs works on our equipment on Kempoch Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:00pm. We will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:48am on Wednesday, 28 October 2020
